ssw: kwakha kabusha timphilo netindlela tekutiphilisa emva kwetikhukhula vukuzenzele unnamed sekusikhatsi lecishe sibe tinyanga letimbili kusukela kwabanetikhukhula letinemandla letabanga tinkinga kuyo yonkhe ikwazulunatali, imphumalanga kapa kanye nenyakatfo nshonalanga, letibange kutsi kube nekulahleka lokukhulu kwemphilo kanye nekulimala kwempha hla nesakhiwonchanti.
ven: u vusuludza matshilo na nḓila dza u ḓitshidza nga murahu ha miḓalo vukuzenzele unnamed zwi tshe zwo tou dzhia miṅwedzi mivhili u bva tshe miḓalo ya tshinyadza zwihulu u mona na zwipiḓa zwa mavunḓu a kwazulunatal, kapa vhubvaḓuvha khathihi na vhukovhela ha devhula, he ya vhanga ndozwo khulu kha matshilo a vhathu khathihi na tshinyalelo kha ndaka na themamveledziso.

ssw: ngisandza kuvakashela ethekwini kwazulunatali kuyohlangana nabosomabhizinisi balelidolobhakati kute sendlulise kubasekela kumitamo yabo yekuphindza babuyisela kusebenta kwetintfo.
ven: a si kale ndo dalela ethekwini kha ḽa kwazulunatal u ṱangana na vhoramabindu vha ḓorobo iyo uri ri vha ṋetshedze thi khedzo kha ndingedzo dza u vusuludza tshumelo yavho.

ssw: ngesikhatsi kwenteka lenhlekelele yemvelo, kube nekukhatsateka kutsi baphatsi abanawo emandla noma sifiso sekuphe ndvula ngendlela lefanele nalesebentako kulesimo salabo labalahlekelwe ngiko konkhe bebanako.
ven: musi tshiwo itshi tsha mupo tshi tshi itea, ho vha na mbilahelo ya uri vha maanḓalanga a vha na nungo nahone vha nga si kone u ṋea thuso yo khwaṱhaho nahone nga nḓila ya khwiṋe kha nyimele iyo i shushaho zwihulusa kha avho vho lozwaho zwoṱhe zwe vha vha vha nazwo.

ssw: uma sengiya kwesibili kulelidolobhakati kusukela kwaba naletikhukhula, kwangicacela kutsi lokukhatsateka bekungakafaneli.
ven: musi ndi tshi dovha u dalela ḓorobo lwa vhuvhili nga murahu ha miḓalo, ndi vho zwi vhona uri mbilahelo heyi yo vha isi yone na luthihi.

ssw: ikwazulunatali, njengoba kunjalo nasemphumalanga kapa nasenyakatfo nshonalanga, bonkhe labadlala indzima bebasebenta ngekutikhandla kute balulame kulesehlakalo lesibuhlungu.
ven: kha ḽa kwazulunatal, u fana na kapa vhubvaḓuvha na vhukovhela ha devhula, zwiimiswa zwoṱhe zwo vha zwi khou shuma zwo khwaṱha uri zwi kone u vuwa nga murahu ha tshiwo itshi tshi shushaho.

ssw: sikhungo savelonkhe sekulawula inhlekelele besichumanisa yonkhe imikhakha yahulumende kumitamo yaso yekuletsa lusito lwetebuntfu emindenini leminengi letsintsekile.
ven: senthara ya ndangulo ya zwiwo ya lushaka yo konanya masia oṱhe a muvhuso kha ndingedzo dzao dza u ṋetshedza ṱhaḓulo ya vhulondavhathu kha miṱa minzhi ye ya ḓo kwamea.

ssw: kube yintfo lejabulisako kubona tinhlangano letitimele tingenelela tisebentisana nahulumende kute tinikete lusito loludzingeka kakhulu.
ven: zwi a takadza u vhona tshitshavha tsha madzangano a si a muvhuso, mabindu khathihi na madzangano a ṱhaḓulo vha tshi farana zwanḓa vha thusana na muvhuso u ṋetshedza thuso ine ya khou ṱoḓea.

ssw: bonkhe laba labadlala indzima bebanika bantfu kudla, timphahla tekugcoka, tingubo tekulala, tekunakekela mtimba kanye netimphahla tesikolo emindenini lebutsakatsaka kute ikhone kumelana netidzingo letisisekelo.
ven: zwiimiswa zwoṱhe hezwi zwo ṋetshedza zwiḽiwa, zwiambaro, nguvho, zwishumiswa zwa ndondolo ya muvhili khathihi na zwiambaro zwa tshikolo kha miṱa i shayaho uri vha kone u wana ṱhoḓea dzavho dza ndeme.

ssw: tinsita tekuhlala kungu nyalo tisaniketwa ebantfwini labangetulu kwe 7 000 kuletigodzi letine letishayeke kakhulu kwazulunatali.
ven: madzulo ndi ane na one zwa zwino a khou ṋetshedzwa kha vhathu vha fhiraho 7 000 kha zwiṱiriki zwiṋa zwo kwameaho zwihulusa kha ḽa kwazulunatal.

ssw: umsebenti wekwakha tindlu tesikhashana sewucalile kumindeni letsintsekile nemhlaba wahulumende sewukhonjiwe kwazulunatali kute bahlaliswe kabusha kuwo.
ven: mushumo wa u fhaṱa vhudzulo ha tshifhinga nyana ha miṱa yo kwameaho na puloto kha mavu a muvhuso dzo topolwa kha ḽa kwazulunatal hune ha nga vha na khonadzeo ya uri vhathu vha pfuluselwe hone.

ssw: litiko letasekhaya, letemphilo nelekutfutfukiswa kwetenhlalo nawo bewancedza imindeni letsintsekile kute ikhone kufinyelela kutinsita leti mcoka.
ven: muhasho wa muno, muta kalo na wa mveledziso ya matshilisano yo vha i tshi khou thusa zwitshavha zwo kwameaho u wana tshumelo ya ndeme.

ssw: sibonelo, emahhovisi labomahamba nendlwane ancedza labo labalahlekelwa madokhumenti abo labucayi ngaletikhukhula kute bakhone kutfola emakhadi lamasha emaid nangekuphindza kukhishwe letinye titifiketi tekutalwa.
ven: sa tsumbo, ofisi thendeleki dzi khou thusa avho vhe vha ḓo lozwa maṅwalo a ndeme nga vhanga ḽa miḓalo uri vha wane basa ntswa dza garaṱa khathihi na u ṋetshedza hafhu ṱhanziela dza mabebo.

ssw: tinsita letingumahamba nendlwane tetemphilo, letifaka kugomela icovid19, nato tiyabonelelwa ebantfwini etindzaweni lapho khona takhiwo tingasebenti ngalokuphelele.
ven: tshumelo thendeleki ya mutakalo, hu tshi katela mihaelo ya covid 19, dzi khou ṋetshedzwa kha vhathu vhane vhupo havho ho vha hu sa athu vha na tshumelo yo raloho.

ssw: tindlela tekukhokhela tibonelelo tahulumende tilungisiwe kulabo labatsintsekile.
ven: hu khou ḓiwa na nḓila dza u holela mindende kha avho vho kwameaho.

ssw: tindlu tekufundzela letingumahamba nendlwane titsengiwe kute kufundza nekufundzisa kungaphatamiseki sikhatsi lesidze etikolweni letitsintsekile ngaletikhukhula.
ven: kiḽasi thendeleki na dzone dzi khou rengiwa uri u funza na u guda zwi si khakhisee lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu kha zwikolo zwo kwameaho nga miḓalo.

ssw: umsebenti wekulu ngisa tindzawo tekuhlanta emanti, titeshi temaphayiphi netekuhanjiswa kwemanti utawentiwa.
ven: mushumo u kati wa u vusuludza mishumo ya u kunakisa dziphaiphi dza maḓi a mashika, zwiṱitshi zwa bommbo khathihi na u dzi ṱumekanya.

ssw: imigwaco leyalimala iyalungiswa.
ven: bada dzo tshinyadzwaho dzi khou vusuludzwa.

ssw: kuhlelwe kutsi kwakhiwe emabhuloho lamasha lalishumi nesiphohlongo njengencenye yeluhlelo iwelisizwe rural bridges.
ven: maburoho maswa a linganaho fumimalo o pulaniwa u fhaṱiwa sa tshipiḓa tsha mbekanyamushumo ya welisizwe rural bridges.

ssw: kube khona futsi inchubekela embili lenkhulu ekulungiseni sakhiwonchanti lesimcoka lesisekela lichweba lasethekwini.
ven: ho no vha hafhu na mvelaphanḓa khulusa kha u lugisa themamveledziso ya ndeme i tikedzaho vhuimangalavha ha durban.

ssw: ngenca yekubaluleka kwalelichweba kumnotfo wavelonkhe nowevekati, kuhamba kwemikhumbi sekubuyele esimeni, kusebenta kwetikhumulo nako kubuyela kusebenta ngalokuphelele futsi umsebenti wekulungisa imizila yetitimela leyalimala nawo uyachubeka.
ven: zwi tshi ya nga vhundeme ha vhuimangalavha uvho kha ikonomi ya shango na dzhango, u tsitsikana ha vhuendi vhuimangalavha zwo vhuedzedzwa ngonani, tshumelo ya zwiṱitshini yo vhuya ngonani nahone mushumo wa u lugisa themamveledziso ya zwidimela yo tshinyadzwaho u kati.

ssw: kunetindlela letengetiwe letibekiwe tekunika kusekela ngetimali kuwo omabili emabhizinisi lamancane nalamakhulu latsintsekile.
ven: maṅwe maga a khou dzudzanywa u ṋetshedza thikhedzo ya masheleni kha vhoramabindu vhaṱuku na vhahulwane vho kwameaho.

ssw: loku kufuneka kwenteke masinyane kute kucinisekiswe kutsi emabhizinisi ahlala asebenta nekutsi ematfuba emisebenti ahlala asimeme.
ven: hezwi zwi khou tea u itwa lwa tshihaḓu u vhona uri mabindu a dzule o ima zwavhuḓi na uri mishumo i vhulungee.

ssw: etikhatsini letehlukene temlandvo wentsandvoyelinyenti, sihlangabetane netigameko netimo leti nkhulu letilinga kutibophelela kwebantfu bakitsi kanye nekusebenta ngalokufanele kwetikhungo tetfu.
ven: nga zwiṅwe zwifhinga kha ḓivhazwakale ya dimo kirasi yashu, ro ḓo livhana na nyimele dze dza linga vhuḓiimiseli hashu sa vhathu khathihi na u linga kushumele kwa zwiimiswa zwashu.

ssw: sibone kubambisana lokungakajwayeleki nekusekelwa kwemindeni kwemimmango yakwazulunatali, yasemphumalanga kapa neyasenyakatfo nshonalanga.
ven: ro ḓo kona u vhona vhuthihi vhu mangadzaho na thikhedzo kha zwitshavha zwo kwameaho zwa kwazulunatal, kapa vhubvaḓuvha na vhukovhela ha devhula.

ssw: bomasipala bendzawo nabohulumende betifundza bebasebentisana nematiko avelonkhe kanye nemaejensi awo kute asite bantfu bakhe kabusha timphilo tabo nekwenta kutsi umnotfo wendzawo uphindze ubuyele usebente futsi.
ven: mivhuso yapo khathihi na ya mavunḓu yo vha i tshi khou shumisana na mihasho ya muvhuso wa vhukati khathihi na mazhendedzi u vhona uri vhathu vha fhaṱe matshilo avho nga huswa khathihi na u vhuedzedza ikonomi yapo u shuma hafhu.

ssw: bebaloku basebentisana nabo bonkhe labadlala indzima kuto tonkhe tindzawo kucinisekisa kutsi sihlanganisa ngemphumelelo imitamo yekuvuselela neyekutsi sihlele futsi sakhe kabusha ngendlela lecinile kakhulu kutigameko letinjengaleti esikhatsini lesitako.
ven: ndi kale vha khou shumi sana na zwiimiswa zwoṱhe zwa vhupo hoṱhe hovhu u vhona uri ri tshimbidza zwavhuḓi ndingedzo dza mvusuludzo na uri ri pulane khathihi na u fhaṱa nga huswa nga nḓila yo khwaṱhaho uri hu sa vhe na zwiwo zwi fanaho na hezwi tshifhinga tshi ḓaho.

ssw: kubeketela kwemimango letsintsekile, kutibophe lela kwabo ekuphemeleleni kanye nelikhono lekusebentisana etikha tsini tenhlekelele kube yintfo legcugcutelanako.
ven: u konḓelela ha zwitshavha zwo kwameaho, u ḓifunga havho kha u bvelela khathihi na maanḓa a u farana zwanḓa nga tshifhinga tshi konḓaho zwi a ṱuṱuwedza.

ssw: sibatfulela sigcoko bonkhe labo bebayincenye yalomtamo wekusita bantfu baletifundza letitsintsekako.
ven: ri fhululedza vhoṱhe avho vhe vha vha tshipiḓa tsha u thusa vhathu vha mavunḓu o kwameaho.

ssw: njengahulumende, sihlanganisa tonkhe tinsita futsi senta yonkhe imitamo yekucinisekisa kutsi, njengoba sakha kabusha, akekho lesimshiyako.
ven: sa muvhuso, ri khou kuvhanganya zwiko zwoṱhe khathihi na u shumisa nungo dzoṱhe u vhona uri, musi ri tshi khou fhaṱa nga huswa, a hu na muthu o siiwaho nga nnḓa.
